title: Sermons preach'd on several occasions by John March ..., the last of which was preach'd the twenty seventh of November, 1692, being the Sunday before he died ; with a preface by Dr. John Scot ; to which is added, A sermon preach'd at the assizes, in New-Castle upon Tine, in the reign of the late King James.
author: March, John, 1640-1692.
notes: Imperfect: frontispiece (portrait) lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
